overview: The narrator tells the story of a boy named Adam who, since childhood, has lived in a mysterious and old inn named (Mermaid). Adam falls in love with his playmate Eve from the early of his childhood, but after Eve reaches adulthood, she leaves the Mermaid inn and her lover, Adam, and turns to prostitution. In this mysterious inn, Adam meets new and strange travelers, each of whom spends a short time with him and teaches him something, and finally leaves, but the only thing that is important to Adam and he will never forget is Eve's love and her return that will not be forgotten until.
title: A Man on the Moon
